mapper.select: select count(*) from VIEW_PROJECT_REVIEW t where t.business_id=#{business_id}
select p.business_id,p.WF_STATE from RCM_PROJECT_INFO p where p.project_no='${project_no}' and p.type = '${type}' and p.wf_state!=3 and p.is_supplement_review ='${is_supplement_review}'
select t.report_create_date from RCM_PROJECT_INFO t where t.business_id=#{business_id} and t.type=#{type}
mapper.insert: insert into rcm_project_info (id, business_id, project_name, project_no, reporting_unit_name, reporting_unit_id, service_type_id, service_type_name, project_type_ids, project_type_names, investment_model, project_model_ids, project_model_names, create_date,type, is_supplement_review,wf_state,istz,pertainAreaId) values (#{id}, #{businessId}, #{projectName}, #{projectNo}, #{reportingUnitName}, #{reportingUnitId}, #{serviceTypeId}, #{serviceTypeName}, #{projectTypeIds}, #{projectTypNames}, #{investmentModel}, #{projectModelIds}, #{projectModelNames}, sysdate,#{type}, #{is_supplement_review},#{wfState}, #{istz},#{pertainAreaId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select t.*,to_char(create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as CREATE_TIME, (select o.name from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE = pertainareaId ) as pertainareaName, to_char(apply_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as APPLY_TIME from ( select * from view_project_review v where v.WF_STATE !='0' and v.TYPE = '${type}'
and exists (select * from rcm_project_relation r where v.business_id = r.business_id and r.user_id = '${user_id}')
union select * from view_project_review v where v.TYPE = '${type}' and v.WF_STATE = '0'
and exists (select * from rcm_project_relation r where r.business_id = v.BUSINESS_ID and r.relation_type = '0701' and r.user_id = '${user_id}')
) t where 1=1
and t.reporting_unit_name like '%${REPORTING_UNIT_NAME}%' and t.project_name like '%${PROJECT_NAME}%' and t.investment_manager_name like '%${INVESTMENT_MANAGER_NAME}%' and t.project_model_names like '%${PROJECT_MODEL_NAMES}%' and t.project_type_names like '%${PROJECT_TYPE_NAMES}%' and t.company_header_name like '%${COMPANY_HEADER_NAME}%' and t.legalreviewleader_name like '%${LEGALREVIEWLEADER_NAME}%' and to_char(t.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = '${CREATE_TIME}'
and (to_char(t.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= '${APPLYTIMEFROM}') and (to_char(t.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= '${APPLYTIMETO}') and ( (to_char(t.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')>='${APPLYTIMEFROM}') and (to_char(t.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')<='${APPLYTIMETO}'))
and t.wf_state in ('0','1','2') and t.wf_state ='${WF_STATE}'
and to_char(t.apply_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = '${APPLY_TIME}' and t.report_create_date is not null and t.controller_val is null and t.is_supplement_review='${IS_SUPPLEMENT_REVIEW}' order by '1' ,t.CREATE_DATE ${ASCDESC} ,t.CREATE_DATE desc ,t.wf_state ${WFSTATEASCDESC}
mapper.delete: delete from rcm_project_info t where t.business_id=#{businessId}
mapper.update: update rcm_project_info set last_update_date=sysdate ,report_create_date=null , controller_val=null , report_id=null where business_id=#{businessId}
mapper.select: select * from rcm_project_info p where p.business_id=#{businessId}
select nvl(sum(count(e.proc_inst_id_)),0) as count from act_ru_execution e where e.business_key_ = #{businessId} group by e.proc_inst_id_

select t.assignee_ as uuid, u.NAME as userName, o.text_ as opinion, to_char(t.end_time_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as create_time from (select * from act_hi_varinst h where h.name_ = 'opinion') o, act_hi_taskinst t, sys_user u where o.task_id_ = t.id_ and t.assignee_ = u.UUID and t.task_def_key_= #{taskDefKey} and exists (select * from act_hi_procinst a where a.business_key_ = #{businessId} and a.proc_inst_id_ = t.proc_inst_id_) order by t.end_time_ desc

select t.assignee_ as uuid, u.NAME as userName, o.text_ as opinion, to_char(t.end_time_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as create_time,o1.name as deptName from (select * from act_hi_varinst h where h.name_ = 'opinion') o, act_hi_taskinst t, sys_org o1,sys_user u where u.DEPTPKVALUE=o1.ORGPKVALUE and o.task_id_ = t.id_ and t.assignee_ = u.UUID and t.task_def_key_= #{taskDefKey} and exists (select * from act_hi_procinst a where a.business_key_ = #{businessId} and a.proc_inst_id_ = t.proc_inst_id_) and rownum=1 order by t.end_time_ desc

select * from ( select r.user_name as review_leader_name,r.user_id as review_leader_id,p.project_name,p.business_id,p.reporting_unit_name as reporting_unit_name, decode(p.type,'preAssessment','预评审','formalAssessment','正式评审','') as project_type, to_char(r.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') as start_time, to_char(p.complete_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as end_time, p.meeting_date as meeting_date, fun_get_workdays(r.create_time, nvl(p.complete_date, sysdate)) as use_days, decode(p.wf_state, '1','跟进中', '2','已完成','3','已终止','') as project_state,
NVL( p.need_meeting , 1) as need_meeting
from rcm_project_info p, rcm_project_relation r where p.business_id = r.business_id
and r.relation_type in('0706','0710') ) ta where 1=1 and ta.project_state is not null and ta.review_leader_id='${review_leader_id}' and ta.review_leader_id = '${reviewLeaderId}' and to_char(ta.start_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = '${startTime}' and ta.project_name like '%${projectName}%' and ta.project_state = '${projectState}' and ta.reporting_unit_name like '%${reportingUnitName}%' and ta.project_type = '预评审' and ta.need_meeting != 0
and ta.project_type = '正式评审' and ta.meeting_date > sysdate and ta.meeting_date <= sysdate and ta.need_meeting = 0
order by ta.start_time desc

select count(*) as num, to_char(r.create_date,'mm') as month from rcm_pre_info r rcm_formalAssessment_info r where r.wf_state!='0' and to_char(r.create_date,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')
and r.reviewpersonid is not null group by to_char(r.create_date,'mm') order by month

select count(*) as num, to_char(r.createtime,'mm') as month from rcm_bulletin_info r where r.stage!='0' and to_char(r.createtime,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') group by to_char(r.createtime,'mm') order by month
